entry.title: Some successful european SaaS startups
entry.content:
Might serve as inspiration for bootstrapping in continental Europe:

"letsannotate.com (Vienna)":http://letsannotate.com/ "letsfreckle.com (Vienna)":http://letsfreckle.com "mite.yo.lk (Berlin)":http://mite.yo.lk/ "mindmeister.com (Munich)":http://www.mindmeister.com/

entry.content:
